abstract: The whole idea of statistics is to find a mathematical representation of what happened in the game. The truth is, some turnovers aren't really turnovers.
snippet: The whole idea of statistics is to find a mathematical representation of what happened in the game. The truth is, some turnovers aren't really turnovers.
lead_paragraph: On the final play in the first half of Sunday's game between the Jets and the Patriots, Tom Brady threw a quick out to tight end Aaron Hernandez. Jets cornerback Antonio Cromartie intercepted the pass near the Patriots' goal line and ran the ball back to the 41-yard-line as the clock expired.

headline.main: N.F.L. Needs Fair Method for Recording Interception Statistics
